bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Inertial Sensor Terminology
Redline
IEEE Standard for Inertial Sensor Terminology - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Terms and definitions relating to inertial sensors are presented in this standard. Usage as understood by the inertial sensor community is given preference over general technical usage of the terms herein. The criterion for inclusion of a term and its definition in this standard is usefulness as related to inertial sensor technology.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
